meta.title: About - Smart Contract Analyzer
meta.purpose: Project information, tech stack, roadmap, and credits

subtitle.text: An open-source tool to detect and mitigate Solidity vulnerabilities

sections.title: Mission
sections.content: To provide developers with a fast, reliable, and open-source tool for identifying smart contract vulnerabilities before deployment.

sections.title: Problem
sections.content: Smart contract vulnerabilities cost billions in losses. Traditional audits are expensive and time-consuming.

sections.title: Solution
sections.content: Real-time, automated vulnerability detection using pattern matching and risk analysis.

milestones.title: AST-based Analysis

milestones.title: ML Integration
milestones.description: Machine learning models for pattern detection, anomaly recognition, and vulnerability prediction

milestones.title: CI/CD Integration
milestones.description: GitHub Actions integration, automated security checks, and continuous monitoring

milestones.description: Containerized deployment with Docker, Kubernetes support, and scalable infrastructure

framer_motion.use_for: page transitions, scroll animations, complex animations

code_splitting.dynamic_imports: for Monaco Editor and other large deps

animation_performance.avoid_layout_props: don't animate width, height, top, left

bundle_optimization.analyze: use bundle analyzer to find bloat

runtime_optimization.useCallback: for callback functions passed to children

screen_readers.aria_labels: for icon buttons and complex components

color_contrast.enhanced: WCAG AAA (7:1 for text) for important content

mobile_first.approach: start with mobile styles, enhance for larger screens
mobile_first.breakpoints: use Tailwind's responsive prefixes (sm:, md:, lg:, xl:)

typography.fluid_sizing: use clamp() for responsive font sizes

testing.integration_tests: Testing Library with MSW for API mocking

visual_hierarchy.primary_actions: highest contrast, largest size, prominent placement

feedback.error_states: clear error messages with recovery options

progressive_disclosure.reveal_on_demand: show more when user needs it

usage_guide.primary_blue: main CTAs, links, primary actions, brand identity

combinations.borders: white at 10% opacity, blue at 40% on hover

card_with_hover.hover: lift effect, border color change, shadow increase

input_with_focus.focus: border color to primary, outline ring
input_with_focus.error: border color to red, error message below

modal_overlay.modal: centered, glass card, slide up animation
modal_overlay.close: X button top right, ESC key, click outside
